CustomField.description: Indicates if you need to add a sales campaign to work this contact or to create an opportunity. Add an additional response only if you need to create an additional opportunity.
CustomField.formula: /*VIEW STATIC RESOURCES AND UPDATE LINKS*/ IF ( OR( /*inactive status values*/ ISPICKVAL( FCRM__FCR_Status__c , "Non Opt-In (Illegal)"), ISPICKVAL( FCRM__FCR_Status__c , "Existing Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL( FCRM__FCR_Status__c , "Disqualified"), ISPICKVAL( FCRM__FCR_Status__c , "Unable to Connect"), ISPICKVAL( FCRM__FCR_Status__c , "On Hold"), ISPICKVAL( FCRM__FCR_Status__c , "Customer"), ISPICKVAL( FCRM__FCR_Status__c , "Opportunity Lost")), IMAGE("/resource/1596596568000/fccrm_Add_Campaign_Image","Add a Response",16,180), IF ( ISPICKVAL( FCRM__FCR_Status__c , "Active Opportunity (System Use)"), /*active opportunity status value */ IMAGE("/resource/1596596568000/fccrm_Additional_Response_Image","Additional Opportunity Requires Response",16,180),IMAGE("/resource/1596596568000/fccrm_Has_Campaign_Image","Has Response",16,180)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if you need to add a sales campaign to work this contact or to create an opportunity. Add an additional response only if you need to create an additional opportunity.
CustomField.label: Response:
